message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $1400000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'd be willing to pay $1300000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $1380000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's true value to me.
